issue.title: [C++] Migrate flight/types.h header definitions to use Result<>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15974](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15974). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is part of ongoing work to migrate the Flight API to use `Result`

Backwards compatibility should work (and is still used by other Arrow code at this point) for all uses besides ones that use override a virtual method. If you know a sane way to support these, let me know.
